about_the_game:
Story:

Enter The Void

On the search for his missing wife and daughter, paranormal investigator, Jonathan Hunter, finds himself trapped in a strange new world. Faced with the ruins of a dying kingdom and searching for answers, Hunter must enlist the help of an amnesiac spirit named Angel and the kingdom’s last remaining denizen: A lonely shopkeeper named Craven. Armed with his wits, a weapon, and newfound mystical powers, Hunter must dive into a plot of revenge, redemption, and insanity on his search for the truth. Together, he and his allies’ will face demons inner and outer to find Hunter’s family and save the kingdom from destruction. No matter the cost…

A Strange New World

Lost in a strange and desolate world, Hunter finds himself wandering through desolate halls and forgotten places. Roam through areas slowly charting your path as you search for clues on where to go and uncover new areas to explore. Journey into the depths of an area hunting for your next objective or just take a second to listen to Hunter and Angel’s conversations.

Act I - An Undying Devotion

Awakening in a strange underground laboratory, Jonathan Hunter; a paranormal investigator, finds himself fighting to survive. Forced to team up with a ghost girl named Angel trapped in a strange artifact, the two must work together to escape the laboratory. All while facing a world overtaken by a strange, magical sickness, seeming to even affect machines. Their journey becomes even more treacherous when a sentient robot known as “Onslaught” begins to hunt them down, in tandem with an odd, magical woman with an affinity for water. They’ll have to master their strange new powers and dive into echoes of the past to reach the surface, which may just have its own dangers…

Gameplay:

A Treacherous Journey

Each area contains a whole host of dangerous entities to contend with. Everywhere he turns, he’s being hunted by enemies with strange, unorthodox appearances. From murderous machines to noise-sensitive wildlife, those out to get him are no normal foes. Seemingly overtaken by an arcane sickness and controlled by a group of mysterious figures, it’s clear that a calamity has taken this world.

An Arcane Blessing

Thankfully, Hunter isn’t alone for the adventure. Along for the ride is an amnesiac spirit, named “Angel”. Trapped inside a strange artifact, Angel functions as a power source for a host of arcane abilities. Light your way with the artifiact’s glow, slow down time, stun your enemies, and a whole host of other abilities as the two journey deeper into the world. Combine your abilities with clever use of weaponry to get an edge over your opponents.

Know Thy Enemy

Hunted by a strange woman with an affinity for water and a dangerous set of abilities, Hunter and Angel will have to dive into her memories to gain enough power to stop her and hopefully cleanse the sickness overtaking the land. Stuck in place with nowhere to run, experience classic Sit-N-Survive style gameplay as you fend off dangerous enemies
